about_the_game:
Shifted Heart is a 2D Sidescrolling Metroidvania. Progression will be tied to use of abilities learned through exploration. How will you scale this cliff? Navigate past these spikes? Clear that chasm? Take down this boss? If you can find a clever way to use your spells, you will craft your own answer to these questions, and many more!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

With the last of my strength... I send you

A great darkness has fallen over the world. You awaken deep underground with no memory, and a quest etched into your mind.

You play as a Shifter. A creature capable of transforming its body into any shape to achieve its goals. Take heed, the forces of nature don't seem to be too friendly to your kind. Luckily, and quite conveniently, your innate abilities lend themselves well to self defense!

Features

  • 8 distinct areas to explore

  • 15 spells to mix and match to your liking

  • 7(?) bosses to conquer

  • Some lore for the curious types
